body:
Hi all,


Just wanted to announce that today, I received a copy of the revised 
version of Rendering with Radiance.


It is paperback, has no color plates, and does not include the original 
cd, but, it has been revised, apparently to more accurately reflect 
some of the changes and updates to Radiance since the 1st edition was 
published in 1998.


I found it through bn.com, but the actual dealer is BookSurge.  The 
price, with shipping was about $38.


http://www.booksurge.com/author.php3?accountID=IMPR02587
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2004-April/001629.html).</sup>
